channel.title: [Updated] Beta Project-Faith [Updated]
channel.description:
[b]Features[/b] -Stable Economy -Can Hold a Decent Amount of Players -[i]Blurr[/i], [i]DeltaScape[/i], [i]Silabsoft[/i], and [i]Moparscape[/i] Clients work on this source. -[i]DeltaScape[/i] Source -Pest Control -350 XP Per Hit -Lots of Training Places -Includes Working [i]Auto Restarter[/i] -Includes [i]Command Maker [/i][Just Copy the Code you Made, and add it to your Client] -Working Lunar, Magicks, and Normal Spells [All Spells Require Runes, Besides Teleports] -Easter Event -Lots of Minigames -New Home Unseen [I don't think any other sources have this Home, but I'm not entirely sure] -Shops are Grouped Togethor -Everything is Semi-Close to Each Other. -Working Cooking -Working Woodcutting -Working Fletching -Working Firemaking _____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[center]Please note that this source is still beta, and needs work. I've only edited a small part of [i]Delta_[/i]'s work. Mainly I've just moved shops, home, added more NPC's, and Items. Also I just started on a Easter Event. I'm done working on this source, because I'm trying to find a different base, mainly I'm just tired of it. I give a ton of credit to [i]Delta[/i], as I edited a little, compared to all of his work. Please do not say I leeched, as I have not, and I've given [i]Delta[/i] his credits. [/center]
Well some of you guys requested pictures, so I decided I might as well add. Please take in note that this source base is DeltaScape, so bassicly the main features are the same.
[center]Updates: Changed XP to 350, Added Pictures Things that need to be edited: Just change the Home Teliport [really minor, should only take like 30 seconds].
-Download Link- [Updated][/center]
[center][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=41ba0fb0759ae1eab64026cfc061123676d8b88469c80e96ce018c8114394287]http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=41ba0fb0759ae1eab64026cfc061123676d8b88469c80e96ce018c8114394287[/url][/center]
[center]Photos..[/center]
[center]Starter Items/Home - [IMG]http://i302.photobucket.com/albums/nn82/waiter_8/StarterItems_ActiveWindow.png[/img]
Some NPC's - [IMG]http://i302.photobucket.com/albums/nn82/waiter_8/EasyNPCs_ActiveWindow.png[/img]
Beta Easter Event - [IMG]http://i302.photobucket.com/albums/nn82/waiter_8/easterevent_ActiveWindow.png[/img]
Woodcutting - [IMG]http://i302.photobucket.com/albums/nn82/waiter_8/woodcutting_ActiveWindow.png[/img]
Fletching - [IMG]http://i302.photobucket.com/albums/nn82/waiter_8/fletching_ActiveWindow.png[/img]
Lunar Magicks - [IMG]http://i302.photobucket.com/albums/nn82/waiter_8/lunarSpells_ActiveWindow.png[/img][/center]

item.title: [Updated] Beta Project-Faith [Updated]
item.dc:creator: @DT-soft DT-soft
item.description:
@DT-soft wrote:

[quote=“si force, post:4, topic:261570”][quote author=runescape3 link=topic=345438.msg2663427#msg2663427 date=1234383997]
800 XP Per Hit? doesn’t sound like a stable economy to me.
[/quote]

Fortunatly the 800 XP rate per hit isn’t having to be related to Economy,
it’s related to your training, shops, items and coins are related to the economy, i’d recommend brushing up on it.

Just a tip post pics or you woo probably get a lot of spam but by features it looks like a great server

Pictures aren’t required, it’s only people who want to know if it has a lot of global objects and a big, heavy process method full of crap.

On topic; It seems like a nice base.[/quote]

800xp rate is almost bad for an economy because every will level up fast. And every one will be a high level fast so they would being using the same type of armor and weapons not any nooby armor at all…

Read full topic
